body.name: 2 Pack Type C Mini Wireless Lavalier Microphone for iPhone 15, iOS and Android Devices - Noise Reduction Lapel Mic for Recording, Clip on Mic, Omni Lav Mic for Video Recording, Tiktok, Youtube, Vlog
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 15 mins
features: [ Noise Reduction Microphone] With the upgraded stable omni-reducing AI chip, the microphone for iphone can reduce noise and pick up your voice, providing a clear timbre for every content creator. And it has a one-button mute function, so you can turn the mini microphone on and off by pressing it once, without restarting it. Just enjoy your creation with this microphone.

[Supports TypeC and iOS] With an apple adaptor, this bluetooth microphone supports all type C and lighting port devices, such as iOS (iPhone 15/ 15 Pro/ Pro Max, etc) and almost all Android Phones(Samsung, Google Pixel, OnePlus) and tablets. (Note: Please turn on the "OTG" function of your USB C device before pairing)

[Long Working Time and Rechargeable] A single microphone can work 6 hours when fully charged (1 hour). It means you can use two microphones for up to 12 hours. You also can use the wireless microphone for iphone when charging your device—no need to worry about battery life.

[Plug & Play] Very easy to set up for this tiny microphone. Just plug the wireless receiver into your iOS device and turn on the transmitter, this wireless mic will auto-pair in seconds (no adaptor, Bluetooth, or application needed.)In addition, the wireless microphone has a 65 FT wireless range, and your activity is not limited.

[Warmly tips] Come with 2 x wireless transmitters, 1 x wireless receiver, 2 x mic clips, 1 x charging cable, and 1 x user manual. We provide a one-year warranty. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, good quality microphone
reviews.reviewText: I’m not extremely tech savvy so I was a little worried about the components of this product but it’s idiot proof. It’s very simple to use. It really is a plug it in and turn it on product. No apps to download and settings to readjust. It’s very simple and gets the job done. Sound quality is significantly better with the microphone especially if you’re a content creator.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive Performance for Charity Event Coverage!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the 2 Pack Type C Mini Wireless Lavalier Microphone for iPhone 15, iOS, and Android Devices, and it has proven to be a game-changer for my live streaming endeavors. These affordable yet durable mics are perfect for capturing crystal-clear audio, ensuring that my charity event coverage reaches new heights.The convenience of the Type C connection makes it seamlessly compatible with a variety of devices, including my iPhone 15 and Android gadgets. The dual-pack provides flexibility, allowing me to capture audio from multiple angles during my live streams.What impressed me the most is the durability of these mini wireless lavalier microphones. They are designed to withstand the dynamic environment of charity events, ensuring reliable performance every time. The build quality instills confidence, knowing that these mics can handle the rigors of on-the-go coverage.Whether I'm interviewing participants, documenting moments, or engaging with the audience, these lavalier microphones deliver exceptional audio quality. The wireless feature adds a layer of freedom, allowing me to move around effortlessly without being tethered to my recording device.In conclusion, if you're in need of an affordable, durable, and high-performing microphone for live streaming, the 2 Pack Type C Mini Wireless Lavalier Microphone is an excellent choice. I wholeheartedly recommend it to fellow content creators, especially those covering charity events. Enhance your audio quality and elevate your live streams with these reliable and versatile microphones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t think it was gonna be this good but the quality of the sound it pick up is pretty clear and loud. Not too much background noises, its all muffled up. Sounds even better if you try to do a asmr. I also liked how there are 2 microphones, you can use em both at the same time and it pick up the sounds no problem. The different adapters are pretty good too, you can use it on old or new phone with no problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Way better than expected!
reviews.reviewText: I've been wanting a mic for TikTok and other social media recording, especially when out in public and lots of background noise. This paired so easily. The instructions were super clear and the sound was incredible. I propped my phone up next to the TV with a show playing and I could hear myself clearly across the room and not the show! I love that there's two mics included and replacement parts just in case. Definitely recommend this!
